channel.title: ENA04 - Yhteiskunta & vaikuttaminen on PJMM - Englannin materiaalia
channel.description: Recent content in ENA04 - Yhteiskunta & vaikuttaminen on PJMM - Englannin materiaalia

item.title: Lauseenvastikkeet: Kirjoita
item.description: Muuta lauseenvastikkeiksi. 1. Johnny does not play football   (vaikka) his brother plays in the Premier League. 2. Jonathan takes cycling lessons    (kun taas) his sister is into show dance. 3. Timothy started studying for his exams   (sen jälkeen kuin) he had taken his sister to school. 4. Jillian studies in the library   (aina kun) she can. 5. She often studies very noisily,   (ikään kuin) she owns the place.
